channel.title: Starting a big project
channel.description:
Hey, all!
I have been a member of the site for over 2 years (8 Hours logged in time O.o) but I have never posted, I have never had a chance to say a big thanks to the community for all the great tutorials they have posted, for which I am very thankfull!
I am starting quite a big project and I was wondering what sources have these features:
~Most least glitchy customs ~Best UI in general ~Server CP ~Minigames, Quests ~least glitchy in general :P
Thanks everyone for your replies!

item.title: Starting a big project
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

i0wnzevr:

Deltascape, or pkplanet

I don’t suggest starting off with a server that already has everything, because those usually have loads of bugs.

Start off with a blank nice base, with no bugs, and if your going to use a Delta, you should only use it if your a decent programmer, because 70% of people can’t fix the bugs on it.

Read full topic
